thread.section_title: Beachcamera Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Beachcamera | www.beachcamera.com | 10 of 12
thread.title: HPG

author: HPG
title: HPG
text: Well I give this vendor - BeachCamera a 5 star rating. I ordered a PC which happened to be on sale for the best price anywhere - internet or local store. I got a promo code online and used it for an extra discount. The PC arrived well within the allocated shipping time, - and it arrived with hardly a scratch on the box. If you additionally count no tax and free shipping -- then you have yourself a good deal - for sure. Also product is exactly what I ordered - and works fine. So --- I certainly am a happy customer, - I'll be checking back on their web site from time to time when I need a purchase ....
